nodes.text: Johun, also known as Johun the Hunter, was a male Mandalorian Trandoshan mercenary active during the time of the Galactic War. He was present at the battle for Kuat Drive Yards, where he was killed in the midst of combat.
Johun appeared as a boss in the flashpoint Kuat Drive Yards in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic: Galactic Starfighter.
